01-basic-banner.title: Basic Banner
01-basic-banner.description: A neutral note banner using background shades instead of semantic colors. The default banner variant for general-purpose messaging.

02-success-banner.title: Success Banner
02-success-banner.description: A success banner variant. Use this to indicate successful completion of an action.

03-warning-banner.title: Warning Banner
03-warning-banner.description: A warning banner variant. Use this to alert users about potential issues or deprecated features.

04-dismissible-banner.title: Dismissible Banner
04-dismissible-banner.description: A dismissible banner with danger variant. Use this for critical alerts that users can dismiss.

05-structured-banner.title: Structured Banner
05-structured-banner.description: A banner with structured content using Title and Body compound components for semantic and organized layouts.
